title: Ancestral Hungers
description: Somewhere in contemporary Illinois...David Bathory returns to his ancestral estate after the death of his father, the head of his family. David is the direct male heir to a birthright he has tried to the lineage of Dracula--which means control over the entire family of vampires. Since his sinsiter uncle wishes to gain the vampire throne (and rule David as well), David is forced with two either claim his birthright at the cost of his immortal soul, or suffer the immediate torments of hell. It's hell one way or the other.
author: Scott Baker
